description:
A time tracker and timesheet app that lets you track work hours across projects.


- Improvement: Implemented infinite scrolling logic for Tasks and Tags dropdowns.
- Improvement: Increased the rate limit for screenshots.
- Improvement: The 'Delete' option in Auto Tracker is now disabled while a recording is in progress.
- Improvement: The 'Merge' option in Auto Tracker context menu is now disabled when only a single item is selected.
- Fix: Resolved an issue where the app failed to launch automatically on system startup.
- Fix: Resolved an issue where timer would not stop on system shutdown.
- Fix: Fixed a bug where running entry is discarded in offline mode when force timer is turned on.
- General: App stability improvements.
